definitions.definition: A machine for creating bales, e.g., of hay or cotton.
definitions.example: Farmer Jones is in straits because his baler is broken down and he's got three fields of hay ready to bale.

definitions.definition: A person who creates bales, either by operating or feeding such a machine, or by creating the bales by hand.
definitions.example: Hank worked as a baler for Farmer Jones part time, to make ends meet.
